trans-unit.source: Thrown when ADSI returns an error during an operation to update the store.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class.
The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> class.
The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
This message takes into account the current system culture.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The text of the error message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref>

A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref>
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
The text of the error message.
A nested exception.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified error code.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> property set to the value of `errorCode`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The text of the message.
An error code.

Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, and the specified error code.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> is set to `errorCode`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
The text of the message.
A nested exception.
An error code.
Returns an integer error code.
Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref>.
The system will return 0 (zero) in the exception error code property if no underlying error was received from a win32 API.
Callers need to distinguish between 0 (zero) and a valid win32 error code.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The object that holds the serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
